src:
米ハロウィーンで銃撃、４人死亡…民泊レンタルで１００人以上参加

02 Nov 2019, 01:48

　【ロサンゼルス＝久保庭総一郎】米カリフォルニア州サンフランシスコ近郊で１０月３１日夜、ハロウィーンのパーティーの会場になっていた民家で銃撃事件があり、４人が死亡し、少なくとも３人が負傷した。犯人は逃走しており、地元当局が行方を追っている。
　現場は閑静な住宅地にある民家で、大学生らが企画した仮装パーティーに１００人以上が参加していた。ＡＰ通信によると、民家は民泊サービスを通じ、大学生がレンタルしていた。
　このほか、ユタ州ルーズベルト近郊の民家で開かれていたパーティーで、２０代の男性２人が撃たれるなどして死亡したのを、地元当局が１１月１日未明に確認した。当局が犯人の特定を急いでいる。
text:
Shooting at Halloween in the United States, 4 deaths ... More than 100 people participated in private rental

02 Nov 2019, 01:48

[Los Angeles = Soichiro Kubotani] On the evening of October 31, near San Francisco, California, there was a shooting case at a private house that was the venue for a Halloween party. Four people died and at least three were injured. The criminal is running away and the local authorities are following.
The site was a private house in a quiet residential area, and more than 100 people participated in a costume party planned by university students. According to AP, private homes were rented by university students through private lodging services.
In addition to this, local authorities confirmed on November 1 at dawn that two men in their 20s were killed at a party held in a private house near Roosevelt, Utah. The authorities are rushing to identify the criminal.
